page.title: 18HEALTH AND LAW AND ORDER
page.content:
{HEALTH SERVICES:}There is a General Medical Practitioner (Dr. Andrew Matchett) with a surgery in the village and there are other medical practices in neighbouring villages. There is a system of Health Visiting for all children from birth to school age and there are District Nurses working in conjunction with the Doctors. The nearest general hospitals are at Kendal and Lancaster.
{POLICE:}There is a Police Station on Silverdale Road with a resident police constable although he is part of a wider policing system centred on Milnthorpe.
{FIRE BRIGADE:}The Arnside Fire Brigade is a voluntary service manned by local men who are called for service only when required.
